channel.title: [317] Tom's Cache Suite - Packing Item Configurations?
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I was wondering if there was a way to pack in all my models I have loaded into the item configurations. If there is an easy way to do it, then I'd really like to know.
I have the models loaded, just don't know how to add them all into the item configs.
Thanks :)
